text: yet’urinimi gara kebelayachihu yanesani sinihoni (be’oriti higi iniditiseru) kidanachihuni beyazini gize (asitawisu)፡፡ «yeset’enachihuni behayili yazu፤ simumi፤» (alini)፡፡«semani amets’inimi» alu፡፡ yeweyifenunimi wideta bekihidetachewi mikiniyati belibochachewi wisit’i tet’et’u፡፡ «amanyochi inidehonachihu iminetachihu berisu yemiyazachihu negeri kefa!» belachewi፡፡
